narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Upmc Magee-womens Hospital is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Pittsburgh, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $43.1M in Medicaid payments across 1.2M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $43.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
